# ui-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description             | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Define the button style | `string` | `'primary'` |


## Events

| Event      | Description                        | Type                      |
| ---------- | ---------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `btnClick` | Emitted when the button is clicked | `CustomEvent<MouseEvent>` |
